title: Build revamped Able Internet Payroll website

requirements.text: Create a modern landing page showcasing payroll management services with hero section, key features overview, and call-to-action elements
acceptanceCriteria: Landing page includes prominent hero section with value proposition
Key features are displayed in an organized, scannable format
Clear call-to-action buttons are present (e.g., 'Get Started', 'Request Demo')
Page is fully responsive across mobile, tablet, and desktop

requirements.text: Display core payroll features including employee management, payroll processing, tax filing and compliance, direct deposit, time tracking integration, benefits administration, and reporting capabilities

quotes: Tax filing and compliance (W-2s, 1099s, quarterly reports)

acceptanceCriteria: Each feature is presented with clear description
Features are organized in logical groupings
Visual hierarchy makes key capabilities immediately apparent

requirements.text: Include sections highlighting mobile access capabilities and platform accessibility
acceptanceCriteria: Mobile access capabilities are prominently featured
Section includes relevant information about platform accessibility

requirements.text: Create informational sections covering compliance, security, and tax filing features (W-2s, 1099s, quarterly reports)

quotes: Tax filing and compliance (W-2s, 1099s, quarterly reports)

acceptanceCriteria: Compliance and security information is clearly presented
Tax filing capabilities (W-2s, 1099s, quarterly reports) are detailed

requirements.text: Design with a professional, trustworthy visual theme appropriate for a financial/payroll service platform, using a sophisticated color palette with clean typography and structured layouts that convey reliability and efficiency
acceptanceCriteria: Color scheme evokes professionalism and trust appropriate for financial services
Typography is clean, readable, and professional
Layout structure is organized and facilitates easy information scanning
Visual style is consistent throughout all pages and components

constraints: This is an informational/marketing website showcase, not a functional payroll processing system
No actual payroll processing, tax calculations, or banking integrations required
No employee data storage or real payment processing needed
nonGoals: Creating banking integrations for direct deposit
Building employee authentication and data management systems

required: Professional hero banner image showing modern office or payroll dashboard interface (hero-banner.dim_1200x600.png)
Icon representing tax filing and compliance (icon-tax.dim_64x64.png)
